casebody.data:
N. C. HINES, Appellant, v. Thomas E. EDWARDS, Appellee. No. 9895. United States Court of Appeals District of Columbia Circuit. Argued April 21, 1949. Decided May 19, 1949. Mr. O. R. McGuire, Washington, D. C., with whom Miss Ivy Lee Buchanan and Mr. Ernest F. Henry, Washington, D. C., were on the brief, for appellant. Mr. Nathan M. Brown, Washington, D. C., with whom Messrs. Samuel B. Brown and Benjamin B. Brown, Washington, D. C., were on the brief, for appellee.

Before EDGERTON, WILBUR K MILLER, and PRETTYMAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

We find no substantial error in the record. The judgment of the District Court is therefore affirmed.
